title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Configure policy tips as popups for labeled emails and attachments (U.S. Government clouds)
description: Configure DLP rules that display warnings in a popup dialog before sending emails. With this capability, admins can set up rules to provide warnings, require business justifications, or request explicit acknowledgements before sending emails. Furthermore, admins can customize a Compliance URL within a DLP rule, ensuring that end users receive valuable guidance through the popup.
